ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] How to improve multiple skills at once
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe.  When smithing, I always played an instrument song, plus begged whenever the icon cleared up (that s one LONG recycle time for a skill that s never got
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe. When smithing, I always played an instrument song, plus begged whenever the icon cleared up (that's
one LONG recycle time for a skill that's never got me more than 1sp). When begging, be prepared to RUN,
though. Standing next to Puntar Sandfisher also lets you play instruments, fish, swim, beg, forage and
bump sense heading (if you can stand swapping instruments and fishing poles). He's a weenie.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 51 songs, Innoruuk (I'd be higher level without the trade skills, but frankly, they
relieve the boredom of camping.)

Jennifer McComb wrote:

> The eastern shore in N. Ro is great for multiple skill building.
> While playing Tarew's Aquatic Ayre with a Mino horn, and swimming
> along the shore, I did some baking. Improved my skills in swimming,
> wind instruments, and baking all at once. A bit hard to imagine
> doing something similar in real life. :)
>
> Adagia, Wood Elf Bard of 16 Ayre's
> <Crimson Order of Norrath>, Druzzil Ro
>
